title: I get Khazix is supposed to hurt when you're alone.
body:
But his 3 Q's just a cumulative 2081 damage to me at level 9.

I get I'm squishy but are you serious with this right here? That's almost 700 damage per Q.

Since for some reason I can't upload attachments

http://imgur.com/QgWP7rn

Edit: For some reason people aren't getting it. I'm not mad I died. I'm not mad an assassin is assassinating me. I'm trying to get down to the bottom of why his Qs are doing 700 damage when with this setup he should be doing 550-600 at most BEFORE armor (as little as I had)
